languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вы целы? Эти головорезы не ранили вас?!" {n}Мужчина неуклюже опирается на подстреленную ногу.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: если был бой с ячейкой бунтовщиков
если был бой с ячейкой бунтовщиков

languages.text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вы целы? Эти головорезы не ранили вас?!" {n}Мужчина неуклюже опирается на подстреленную ногу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Not injured by those cutthroats, I hope?" {n}The man has been shot in one of his legs and is awkward at putting his weight on it.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Se encuentra bien, Lord Capitán? Esos matones no le habrán hecho daño, ¿no?». {n}La pierna artificial del hombre ha recibido un disparo, por lo que le cuesta soportar su peso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Se encuentra bien, Lord Capitán? Esos matones no le habrán hecho daño, ¿no?». {n}La pierna artificial del hombre ha recibido un disparo, por lo que le cuesta soportar su peso.{/n}

languages.text: 「大丈夫ですか、ロード・キャプテン？あの残忍な連中に痛めつけられたりしていませんよね？」{n}彼の義足は撃たれており、ぎこちなくもその体重を支えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「大丈夫ですか、ロード・キャプテン？あの残忍な連中に痛めつけられたりしていませんよね？」{n}彼の義足は撃たれており、ぎこちなくもその体重を支えている。{/n}

languages.text: “你没事吧，舰长大人？那些杀手应该没有伤到你吧？”{n}这个男子的假腿中了一枪，歪歪斜斜地支撑着他的身体。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你没事吧，舰长大人？那些杀手应该没有伤到你吧？”{n}这个男子的假腿中了一枪，歪歪斜斜地支撑着他的身体。{/n}

languages.text: "Geht es Euch gut, Lord Captain? Diese Halsabschneider haben Euch doch hoffentlich nicht verletzt?" {n}Die Beinprothese des Mannes wurde angeschossen und trägt sein Gewicht nur noch mühsam.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Geht es Euch gut, Lord Captain? Diese Halsabschneider haben Euch doch hoffentlich nicht verletzt?" {n}Die Beinprothese des Mannes wurde angeschossen und trägt sein Gewicht nur noch mühsam.{/n}

languages.text: « Tout va bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? J'espère que ces bandits ne vous ont pas fait de mal. » {n}L'homme a reçu une balle dans l'une de ses jambes prothétiques, qui semble avoir le plus grand mal à supporter son poids.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}

languages.text: "İyi misiniz Lord Kaptan? O katiller sizi incitmedi umuyorum." {n}Adamın vurulan protez bacağı, tüm ağırlığını tuhaf bir şekilde taşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you all right, Lord Captain? Those cutthroats didn't hurt you, I hope?" {n}The man's prosthetic leg has been shot, and it carries his weight awkwardly.{/n}
